FLHS_ENABLE.DisplayName: Full house glider (FLSH) configuration instead of Differencial Spoiler (DSPOILER)
FLHS_ENABLE.Description: if set to 1, use the FLSH parameter to control a full house glider (4 surfaces, Aileron, camber, Flap/crow)

FLHS_FLP_IN_D.DisplayName: Full house glider flaps inner down weight
FLHS_FLP_IN_D.Description: This is amount of down deflection applied to the two inner surfaces for flap function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_FLP_OUT_U.DisplayName: Full house glider flaps outer up weight
FLHS_FLP_OUT_U.Description: This is amount of up deflection applied to the two outer surfaces for flap function (crow). It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_FLP_EL_MX.Description: This is amount of elevator deflection when flaps are applied. It is a percentage -100 to 100.

FLHS_CMB_IN_D.DisplayName: Full house glider camber inner down weight
FLHS_CMB_IN_D.Description: This is amount of down deflection applied to the two inner surfaces for camber function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_CMB_IN_U.DisplayName: Full house glider camber inner up weight
FLHS_CMB_IN_U.Description: This is amount of up deflection applied to the two inner surfaces for camber function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_CMB_OUT_D.DisplayName: Full house glider camber outer down weight
FLHS_CMB_OUT_D.Description: This is amount of down deflection applied to the two outer surfaces for camber function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_CMB_OUT_U.DisplayName: Full house glider camber outer up weight
FLHS_CMB_OUT_U.Description: This is amount of up deflection applied to the two outer surfaces for camber function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_AIL_IN_D.DisplayName: Full house glider aileron inner down weight
FLHS_AIL_IN_D.Description: This is amount of down deflection applied to the two inner surfaces for aileron function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_AIL_IN_U.DisplayName: Full house glider aileron inner up weight
FLHS_AIL_IN_U.Description: This is amount of up deflection applied to the two inner surfaces for aileron function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_AIL_OUT_D.DisplayName: Full house glider aileron outer down weight
FLHS_AIL_OUT_D.Description: This is amount of down deflection applied to the two outer surfaces for aileron function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

FLHS_AIL_OUT_U.DisplayName: Full house glider aileron outer up weight
FLHS_AIL_OUT_U.Description: This is amount of up deflection applied to the two outer surfaces for aileron function. It is a number from 0 to 100.

KTW_POS_UP.DisplayName: upper position of KTW for automaic throttle
KTW_POS_UP.Description: This is the position of the KTW servo for activating the motor. (servo movement +/-100)

KTW_POS_FREE.DisplayName: lowest position of KTW for free running motor
KTW_POS_FREE.Description: This is the lowest position of the KTW servo, that the motor is enabled. (servo movement +/-100)

KTW_SLEW.DisplayName: slew rate of the KTW servo
KTW_SLEW.Description: this is the (maximum) speed of the KTW servo (%/sec for the full movement)

LGR_SLEW.Description: define the servo speed to retract or deploy landing gear

RC1_OPTION2.DisplayName: RC input option2, activated when Input switch set to low
RC1_OPTION2.Description: 2nd Function assigned to this RC channel. You can use a 3pos switch to activate two different functions. OPTION at HIGH and OPTION2 at LOW position.
RC1_OPTION2.Values: 0:Do Nothing, 4:ModeRTL, 9:Camera Trigger, 11:Fence, 16:ModeAuto, 22:Parachute Release, 24:Auto Mission Reset, 27:Retract Mount, 28:Relay On/Off, 29:Landing Gear, 30:Lost Plane Sound, 31:Motor Emergency Stop, 34:Relay2 On/Off, 35:Relay3 On/Off, 36:Relay4 On/Off, 38:ADSB Avoidance En, 41:ArmDisarm (4.1 and lower), 43:InvertedFlight, 46:RC Override Enable, 51:ModeManual, 52: ModeACRO, 55:ModeGuided, 56:ModeLoiter, 58:Clear Waypoints, 62:Compass Learn, 64:Reverse Throttle, 65:GPS Disable, 66:Relay5 On/Off, 67:Relay6 On/Off, 72:ModeCircle, 77:ModeTakeoff, 78:RunCam Control, 79:RunCam OSD Control, 81:Disarm, 82:QAssist 3pos, 84:Air Mode, 85:Generator, 86: Non Auto Terrain Follow Disable, 87:Crow Select, 88:Soaring Enable, 89:Landing Flare, 90:EKF Pos Source, 91:Airspeed Ratio Calibration, 92:FBWA, 94:VTX Power, 95:FBWA taildragger takeoff mode, 96:trigger re-reading of mode switch, 98: ModeTraining, 100:KillIMU1, 101:KillIMU2, 102:Camera Mode Toggle, 105:GPS Disable Yaw, 106:Disable Airspeed Use, 107: EnableFixedWingAutotune, 108: ModeQRTL, 150: CRUISE, 153:ArmDisarm (4.2 and higher), 154:ArmDisarm with Quadplane AirMode (4.2 and higher), 155: set roll pitch and yaw trim to current servo and RC, 157: Force FS Action to FBWA, 158:Optflow Calibration, 160:Weathervane Enable, 208:Flap, 209: Forward Throttle, 300:Scripting1, 301:Scripting2, 302:Scripting3, 303:Scripting4, 304:Scripting5, 305:Scripting6, 306:Scripting7, 307:Scripting8

RC12_OPTION2.Values: 0:Do Nothing, 4:ModeRTL, 9:Camera Trigger, 11:Fence, 16:ModeAuto, 22:Parachute Release, 24:Auto Mission Reset, 27:Retract Mount, 28:Relay On/Off, 29:Landing Gear, 30:Lost Plane Sound, 31:Motor Emergency Stop, 34:Relay2 On/Off, 35:Relay3 On/Off, 36:Relay4 On/Off, 38:ADSB Avoidance En, 41:ArmDisarm (4.1 and lower), 43:InvertedFlight, 46:RC Override Enable, 51:ModeManual, 52: ModeACRO, 55:ModeGuided, 56:ModeLoiter, 58:Clear Waypoints, 62:Compass Learn, 64:Reverse Throttle, 65:GPS Disable, 66:Relay5 On/Off, 67:Relay6 On/Off, 72:ModeCircle, 77:ModeTakeoff, 78:RunCam Control, 79:RunCam OSD Control, 81:Disarm, 82:QAssist 3pos, 84:Air Mode, 85:Generator, 86: Non Auto Terrain Follow Disable, 87:Crow Select, 88:Soaring Enable, 89:Landing Flare, 90:EKF Pos Source, 91:Airspeed Ratio Calibration, 92:FBWA, 94:VTX Power, 95:FBWA taildragger takeoff mode, 96:trigger re-reading of mode switch, 98: ModeTraining, 100:KillIMU1, 101:KillIMU2, 102:Camera Mode Toggle, 105:GPS Disable Yaw, 106:Disable Airspeed Use, 107: EnableFixedWingAutotune, 108: ModeQRTL, 150: CRUISE, 153:ArmDisarm (4.2 and higher), 154:ArmDisarm with Quadplane AirMode (4.2 and higher), 155: set roll pitch and yaw trim to current servo and RC, 157: Force FS Action to FBWA, 158:Optflow Calibration, 160:Weathervane Enable, 208:Flap, 209: Forward Throttle, 300:Scripting1, 301:Scripting2, 302:Scripting3, 303:Scripting4, 304:Scripting5, 305:Scripting6, 306:Scripting7, 307:Scripting8
